user.biography:
A small local bakery creating big things. 
OG @eastendmkt 10-7 daily
Flagship @disneysprings Now Open! 
IG Run by the owner, Steve. Sup?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on August 21, 2021. May be an image of food.

node.text:
Happy Saturday!  We've got a few goodies for you this weekend.  It's going to be a scorcher so, pro tip to our friends visiting Disney Springs, bring an umbrella to guard you against that sun! 🧛🏻‍♂️⁣
⁣
BITES ANNOUNCEMENT!  Today we have a special batch of the Limited Edition Peanut Butter Chocolate Swirl Bites at both locations!  These are next-level amazing and will go fast. While I'm talking about Bites, regular Bite Bags are back with an upgrade starting Monday! Each bag of 6 Bites will have a variety of popular core flavors plus one guaranteed mystery Limited Edition Bite from a past release! Which mysteriously delicious Bite will you discover?  We're aiming to keep these Bites in stock every day through September, so don't miss out!⁣ For those new to Bites, they are quartered Gideon’s Cookies hand dipped in chocolate for an even richer Bite sized experience!  Perfect with Cold Brew! 
⁣
Rocky Road Cake Slices are back for the weekend at both locations because you need that Marshmallow Buttercream in your world.⁣
⁣
Finally, because we love supporting local artists (and we know you do as well), Gideon's at @EastEndMkt will be releasing a second wave of the popular Gideon's handmade decorative plates.  Made by the multi-talented @CassandraMelena, these gorgeous collector plates come in a variety of finishes.  They go on sale at 10 am and are first come, first serve, so the earlier you arrive, the better the selection! $34 each⁣ / Limit 2 Per Person 
Bonus info: Cassandra and I have worked together since 2001, and she is a significant reason why the interior of Gideon's at @DisneySprings is so gorgeous.  Her decor skills are most impressive, and she has worked on everything from costuming in the production of Lion King to zombie makeup on the TV show Z Nation! 🧟‍♀️⁣
⁣
Have a great weekend!  Protect our desserts from the heat. Conserve your water. Love each other.

Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on August 21, 2021.
Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on August 12, 2021. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
Common questions heard at Gideon's Bakehouse:  1) What's your favorite Cookie? 2) Are we living in a simulation? 3) Will you ever bring back the Cookies & Cream Nitro Cold Brew? Well, my friends, we gotcha on that Cold Brew!  That's right, the Gideon's dessert coffee, known to the world as the Cookies & Cream Nitro Cold Brew, is now a sweet daily offering at Disney Springs to help you get through these hot Florida days. No store bought syrups, just real Cookies and locally roasted Cold Brew. Stay refreshed. Be energized. ⁣
⁣
But wait!  I told you stuff was happening this month, so there's more!  How about a second Hot Cookie Hour to make it easier to acquire?  Starting today, Hot Cookie Hour is available from 2-3 pm and 7-8 pm!  Get a Chocolate Chip Cookie straight from the oven with a scoop of locally made Malted Vanilla Ice Cream! ⁣
⁣
Reminder: Today is the last day for the Flavors of Florida Cookie, the Key Lime Pie Chocolate Chip!  We will miss it greatly!  If you have somehow missed this one, today is your day!  If you love key lime as we do, don't despair. The Key Lime Pie Cake Slices will make semi-regular appearances throughout the year.⁣
⁣
And don't forget Pipistrello's favorite, The Dark Coffee Cake Cookie, is a Dreadfully Good new offering available at Sunset every day! It's a thrilling bonus for our friends who only come out at night. 🦇⁣
⁣
We sure do pack a lot into our little bakery.  Just sayin'. ⁣
⁣
All the items listed above are exclusive to Gideon's at @DisneySprings.  Bite Bags are also back, for a limited time, at both locations.  Each bag contains an assortment of six Bites and is super yum yums with Cold Brew at Gideon's or, for our East End peeps, the delicious offerings from our friends at @LineageCoffeeRoasting.⁣
⁣
Be good to each other.  We'll see you soon. 🖤

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on August 12, 2021. May be an image of drink and indoor.
Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on August 12, 2021. May be an image of food and indoor.
Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on August 07, 2021. May be an image of dessert.

node.text:
The bonus goods are FIERCE this weekend so let's get to it.  Rocky Road Cake!  That's right! Three Layers of Chocolate Cake, the much-requested Marshmallow Buttercream, and look at all those Candied Almonds! At both locations, while supplies last, Saturday and Sunday! Anything with a Marshmallow Buttercream has been selling at lightning speed so early birds, my friends.  Early birds.  Limited 2 per person. Sorry, this is not a preorder item, whole or sliced. ⁣
⁣
The Bites are Back with an Eternal Flame! 🔥 🖤 This ridiculous summer heat has inspired us to bring back the Cookie with a Kick! The Eternal Flame Limited Edition is a Velvety Five Flavor Chocolate Cookie, laced with our special house-made Ancho, Cayenne, and Cinnamon Spice Mix all covered in Chocolate Covered Cherries. To make it a Bite, we quarter each Cookie and hand dip it in chocolate! 6 Eternal Flame Bites Per Bag! And speaking of bags, this captivating new bag design is officially approved by our latest friend, Pipistrello!  If you don't know who he is, you need to read our previous post! 🇮🇹🦇 While Supplies Last at both locations. Limit 2 bags per person.⁣
⁣
Have a great weekend, and look for even more announcements (we're on a roll!) coming soon!⁣
⁣
🍪📷 #fujifilm #gfx50r #gf250mmf4 #foodphotography #cookies  #DisneySprings @disneysprings #EastEndMarket @eastendmkt #gideonsbakehouse #shoplocal

node.text:
If we believe the rumors about the mysterious Pipistrello, he was found orphaned in the alps of Northern Italy. Given the boy's peculiar looks, he was abandoned at a nearby village until a wealthy eccentric decided to raise him as his own.  He exposed the unusual son to the most exemplary academics of his age, studying philosophy, alchemy, and music, eventually molding the young boy into a true renaissance bat.⁣
⁣
Always looking to continue his studies, Signore Pipistrello (which translates from Italian to "Gentleman Bat") traveled to the states searching for rare books last said to be held by the previous owner of our space, Jonathan Lindwurm.  When he arrived at our doorstep, he was surprised by the store's transformation yet equally delighted, as he is always in search of confections to tame his rabid love of chocolate.  He has enjoyed all of our desserts while reading through our library quietly in the shadows. Still, he has expressed a desire to try our morning Coffee Cake Cookie, which eludes him, for he can only emerge at night. So, to honor our new friend, Pipistrello, we have combined his love of chocolate with the elusive Coffee Cake to create the Dark Coffee Cake!⁣
⁣
The Dark Coffee Cake Cookie is a Gideon's Coffee Cake Cookie with a chocolate cookie base. Our rarest release is available tonight and every night exclusively at Gideon's in Disney Springs. Like Pipistrello, the Dark Coffee Cake Cookie can only come out after dark and will be yours for the taking every evening strictly at Sunset until Sell Out! Ask your smartphone the time for Sunset, and Pipistrello's Cookie will be waiting.🦇⁣
⁣
With a new friend comes new merchandise!  The Pipistrello Unisex T-shirt and premium sticker are now available online and will be in-store starting Saturday!  We're also opening up preorders for a Limited Edition Signore Pipistrello art print signed, of course, by our very own esteemed director of art, Michael Reyes aka @mreyes.art!  Preorders will be taken for the next 30 days.  Once orders are cut off, the prints will need 2-3 weeks for production and shipping.  Check our website for details!

node.text:
It's National Chocolate Chip Cookie Day, and that's kinda what we do, so let's celebrate with Cookies and Cake!  Today, at both locations, we have wonderfully tasty slices of the Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake!  Three Layers of Chocolate Cake! Marshmallow Buttercream! Chunks of Cookie! Ghirardelli Dark Chocolate Chip Coating! This is one of our most popular bonus cakes and is expected to move quickly today, so don't delay!  Limit two per person.⁣⁣⁣ 🚨 Both shops are SOLD OUT!! 🚨
⁣⁣⁣
I often get asked why people would wait in line for the Gideon's Chocolate Chip Cookie.  While the answer to that lies more with you than me, I sometimes say that it is a very sentimental recipe that took me over 15 years of tinkering to complete.  I tend to bake when I'm sad (yes, the salt on Gideon's cookies were really harvested from my tears), so that cookie carries so many emotional memories for me. We've been through a great deal together, and I'm delighted where we ended up.  Because I don't know what I'm doing, it's a unique approach to making cookies, and the final result is the chocolate chip cookie that I've always wanted to eat. It still surprises me now and again with how much I enjoy it.  We all taste foods differently, but I hope that my Chocolate Chip Cookie brings you as much delight as it brings me. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
🚨PRO TIP: Eat the Gideon's Chocolate Chip Cookie at room temp.  When it's fully cooled, you get to taste the mix of vanilla and chocolate as intended.  That cookie is 5 ounces of vanilla bean dough mixed with just over 2 ounces of semi-sweet and dark chocolate chips, but when it is warm, the chocolate entirely overtakes the vanilla.  Basically, I'm telling you to stop eating my cookies (and cake) in the ultra-hot Florida sun. Get them to safety after purchase! If the chocolate sticks all over your fingers, you're not enjoying the cookie at its best.  Also, I know you'll wipe your hands on your (or someone else's) pants, and I'm trying to help you avoid such things. You're welcome. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
🎉 Happy National Chocolate Chip Cookie Day, Ladies and Gentlemen! Our darkest, most forbidden love goes out to you from all 154 of us at Gideon's Bakehouse. 🖤

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on August 01, 2021. May be an image of food and indoor.

node.text:
Your August Cookie is The Rocky Road! This almost 1/2 pound gourmet Cookie is taken to the top with every single step. Step 1: Start with our amazingly velvety Triple Chocolate Cookie base (really five kinds of chocolate), smothered in semi-sweet and dark chocolates. Step 2: Mix in our housemade double-baked Whole Candied Almonds. Step 3: Top it with a mountain of gooey marshmallow goodness. Step 4: Set that Cookie on Fire!! ⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣🔥⁣
⁣
⁣Available at both locations, Gideon's at @DisneySprings and @EastEndMkt, every day of August. Limited Edition items will sell out each day, so there is a limit of two per paying guest.⁣⁣ The earlier you arrive, the better your chances of seeing it in stock! ⁣⁣
⁣
There is more coming to August, but we don't want to beat you over the head with everything at once, so keep an eye on our feed! Remember, as part of the Flavors of Florida event, the Key Lime Chocolate Chip Cookie and Key Lime Pie Cake will still be available at Gideon's in Disney Springs through the 12th, but quantities will be very limited, and they will likely sell out early each day.⁣
⁣
🍪📷 #fujifilm #gfx50r #gf250mmf4 #foodphotography #cookies #DisneySprings #EastEndMarket #gideonsbakehouse #shoplocal

node.text:
🚨 Cookies & Cream Cold Brew has SOLD OUT! Thanks to everyone that came out. If you didn’t see me and give feedback, please DM me! 🚨 … Look what's back!  Earlier this year, we released our Cookies & Cream Nitro Cold Brew for one day!  It was a splendid time, and your feedback was terrific, but we thought we could make it even better. The Gideon's promise is that we'll always give you our best, so we went back to the drawing board.  After months of extra testing, we're putting version 2.0 of this Dessert Cold Brew out into the wild!  There are no store-bought flavor syrups in our house. 100% actual finely crushed Cookies & Cream is what brings the magic! ✨⁣
⁣
Available TODAY ONLY in Gideon's Bakehouse at @DisneySprings starting at 10 am until the last one is gone.  I'll update the post if we get wiped out before the day of over. ⁣
⁣
While you're visiting, don't miss out on all things Key Lime!  The Key Lime Chocolate Chip Cookie leaves East End at the end of this month.  It will, however, be available in Gideon's at Disney Springs, as part of the Flavors of Florida event, through August 12th. Also, we've made a dapper new friend that you'll get to meet this Sunday, along with new Cookies for the month!  Prepare thyself!! 🦇⁣
⁣
xoxo

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on July 19, 2021. May be an image of dessert and indoor.

node.text:
On July 19th, 2016, I showed up at the East End Market for my first day of a month long popup, the first public appearance of Gideon's Bakehouse. Before that, I had only ever made cookies in my kitchen and sold them to coworkers at Apple and neighbors in College/Winter Park. I was a bundle of nerves and unsure what I was doing, but I was curious how far I could take a passionate hobby.  Thanks to a supportive community, that first day and every day since has been a bit crazy.⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Small business ownership is full of so many risks and rewards.  Those of us who are in it for personal creative expression can often feel eternally vulnerable.  The days are filled with either satisfaction or distress.  It can inflate your ego and deepen your insecurities.  You get to meet so many amazing people but feel lonely at the same time. There is no off switch for us, and that can be alienating. But when you do it right, you can be a better version of yourself with each day.  To build the business, you must first develop yourself, for we are the most critical tool in the box. I believe this drive for personal growth and expression is why so many of us risk it all to enter this unstable world. So today, on the Gideon's popup anniversary, I'm thinking of all of you that put your heart and soul on the line to make something out of nothing. ⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
Today also deserves a special thanks to John, Ashley, Jess, and Megan, at the @eastendmkt, for helping Gideon's the popup become Gideon's Bakehouse, a part of Orlando's epic food scene. 🖤⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣
📷 Photos in this post are all from the home kitchen days, plus one of the line during the first week of the popup.  Favorites are the first website launch day (featuring my cat Savant) and my first attempt at designing a PB Cold Brew label seven years ago!  I still haven't figured out how to bottle that magic! 😅

node.text:
Happy 4th of July!  The @EastEndMkt is closed today, so Gideon's at East End Market will return on Monday.  However, Gideon's at @DisneySprings is open 365.  Weekends can be busy, so if you need help planning, be sure to check out the "Things to Know" section of our website under Locations/DisneySprings.  Remember, our wait out there is virtual, so you can sign up when you arrive, then go and eat, or shop, get Fast and Furious, and BOOM, we'll be ready for you to get in our return line averaging 15 minutes.  If you get there early, be sure to try a Coffee Cake Cookie with our recommended pairing of Gingersnap Cold Brew.  I want that every morning of my life.⁣
⁣
We wanted to do a fun Red, White, and Blue bonus cake slice today, but, like all restaurants, staffing is exceptionally challenging right now, which means extra fun has to take a back seat now and again. Gideonsbakehouse.com/jobs is the place to be if you or anyone you know is looking for work.  Our Winter Garden production kitchen is almost always hiring, and that ranges from basic production work to skilled bakers. The biggest requirement is that you are a good person. 😸
⁣
📷 #fujifilm #gfx50r #gf250mmf4 👈 my favorite lens #gargoyle #shoplocal #DisneySprings #EastEndMarket #gideonsbakehouse

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on July 01, 2021. May be an image of food and indoor.

node.text:
The Flavors of Florida Event at @DisneySprings is about to begin, and we're doing our part by giving praise to the almighty Florida Key Lime!  Our July Limited Edition flavor is a brand new release, the Key Lime Chocolate Chip Cookie! Imagine our beloved Vanilla Bean Cookie Dough infused with Florida Key Lime Juice and covered with Chocolate Chips and our special Key Lime Pie Crumbs. Full disclosure, my absolute favorite Florida-specific dessert is the chocolate dipped frozen Key Lime Pie on a stick, so we're paying tribute! ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
This Cookie is AVAILABLE TODAY and every day this month in Gideon's at @EastEndMkt and Gideon's at @DisneySprings! Limited Edition items will sell out each day, so there is a limit of two per paying guest.⁣⁣ The earlier you arrive, the better your chances of seeing it in stock! ⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣ ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
CAKE! We're continuing our Key Lime obsession with cake by bringing back one of your favorites, the Key Lime Pie Cake!  This 3-layer Vanilla Key Lime Cake has a tangy Key Lime Cream Cheese Frosting and our house-made graham cracker crust accents.  This gem will be available by the slice every weekend at the East End Market location and every single day in Gideon's at Disney Springs!⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Did You Know?: Florida legend tells us that the key lime was initially given to early Spanish explorers by a pod of beautiful, raven-haired mermaids they called “Las Agrias.” Years later, Florida fishermen introduced the world to Key Lime Pie. 💫🧜‍♀️

node.text:
Happy Monday!  Apologies for the lack of posts and any missed questions.  Creating Gideon's at Disney Springs has been over a year of nonstop work, so I finally took a few days to run off to the mountains.  While I was away, I missed my cats, my crew, and my Cold Brew.  I've said before that I was more nervous about releasing our new Cold Brew than any other Gideon's offering.  As with all food and drink, we all have different taste buds, but, let's face it, coffee fanatics are next-level with extreme variations on how they like their coffee.  With Gideon's Cold Brew flavors, my goal was to find balance.  I spent a few years testing out things like the Peanut Butter Cold Brew hunting for that intersection where coffee lovers and non-coffee people meet.  I'm happy with where we landed, and from the overwhelming feedback you have offered, it seems you appreciate the work we put out there.  No one can ever claim to be the best, but we promise to always provide you with our best.  Quality ingredients are continually a priority, and we are working on a couple more flavors to add to our little family of Cold Brews. Special thanks to the dedicated and talented people at @lineagecoffeeroasting for fueling our drinks with their locally roasted beans. ⁣
⁣
🏳️‍🌈 Today is officially Pride Day!  Our Rainbow Crunch Cake will be at both locations today while supplies last (which is usually early to mid-afternoon). If you have yet to try it, don't miss out.  It's lovely.  If you can't make it, we celebrate Pride, love, and equality all year so expect it to pop up now and again. ⁣ Limit one per person so more people have a chance to get it, please and thank you! 
⁣
🌈 Pride Mugs!  @potheadsbyamber has made a special batch of Gideon's Handmade Pride Mugs!  There are available TODAY only at Gideon's at East End Market.  Limit One Per Person. No holds.  We don't ship these mugs, so run to East End ASAP! ⁣
⁣
Enjoy the week, my friends!  We have a new flavor coming in July!  It's a special one for me. Prepare Thyself!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Gideon's Bakehouse on June 12, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, food and indoor.

node.text:
Today is National Peanut Butter Cookie Day, and we don't mess around when it comes to our beloved Peanut Butter so let's get crazy.  Today only, we're introducing the Gideon's Peanut Butter Cookie Sandwich!  Two Peanut Butter Crunch Cookies married together with a layer of our addicting Peanut Butter Buttercream! These beauties clock in at almost one pound and are meant to be shared ... or are they?  Full confession, I ate 1/2 in one sitting, no problem.  We don't pack our PB Cookie our PB Buttercream with sugar.  You can do this. This sandwich is calling you.  Available at both locations while supplies last.  Limit 2 per person.⁣
⁣
Also, a reminder, the Rainbow Crunch Pride Cake Slice is available every weekend at the East End Market and every day in Gideon's at Disney Springs!  It's mega popular, so get there earlier if you don't want to miss out!⁣ 🚨Pride Cake has Sold Out for Sunday at Both Locations!
⁣
It's going to be a hot weekend (and summer), and our lines stretch outside, so be sure you stay hydrated. Also, umbrellas are all the rage these days! ☂🧛🏻‍♂️⁣
⁣
🍪📷 #fujifilm #gfx50r #gf3264mm #foodphotography #cookies #shoplocal #DisneySprings #EastEndMarket #gideonsbakehouse #pride #pridemonth
